Author: Little-Rexy
Text: I’m making a redirection box today- I am hopping that helps-

Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: I hate intrusive thoughts so much. It gets freaking exhausting. And when you try to explain “my head is loud” to ‘normal’ people, they just look at you like you’re speaking Klingon or something.   Maybe the folks at PHP will have some helpful suggestions/strategies? My go-to is chaining together small distraction activities. It can help short-term but when the thoughts are really persistent...it’s just hard. I haven’t personally had much luck with meds for obsessive/intrusive thoughts, but some people do seem to.
